DOC.brief_title: Radiation Therapy Surgery Treating Patients With Previously Untreated Vulva Cancer With Positive Groin Lymph Nodes
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare efficacy pelvic node resection vs. bilateral groin pelvic node irradiation invasive squamous cell carcinoma vulva patient positive groin node . OUTLINE : Randomized study . Arm I : Surgery . Deep pelvic node dissection side contain positive node . Arm II : Radiotherapy . Megavoltage ( 1 MeV great ) bilateral groin pelvic node . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Anticipated annual accrual approximately 200 patient , active phase estimate 2.5-3 year . Protocol close July 1984 .
DOC.criteria: DISEASE CHARACTERISTICS : See General Eligibility Criteria PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS : See General Eligibility Criteria
